name: Login Page Customize
author: HabibCoder

sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
sections.faq:
Is it very hard to install and use?

No, It is very easy to install and use.

Is this plugin responsive for any website?

Yes, It is responsive for any website.

May I change the background image and logo?

Yes, You can change the background image and logo.

Can I customize all things of WordPress Login Page?

Yes, You can customize all things of WordPress Login Page.

Can I customize all things of WordPress Register Page?

Yes, You can customize all things of WordPress Register Page also.

Is it possible to contact with plugin author?

The Plugin admin page has enough author info to contact me.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • A new plugin
  • Background image change option
  • Logo change option
  • Login page customize option
  • Register page customize option
  • Links change option
  • Text change option
  • Primary, Secondary color change option

UPDATING

Automatic updates should work seamlessly. We always suggest you backup your website before any automated update to avoid unforeseen problems.
sections.description:
Login Page Customize is a very useful Login Page Customize plugin with more functionality. The plugin has more functions to customize a login page

About Login Page Customize

Login Page Customize is a very useful to customize a WordPress login page plugin. Login Page Customize plugin has more functions with all things of login page and register page. You can change background image, logo and primany, secondary color. login page all text change option and Register page all text change option. You can choose the link open options in same tab or a new tab.
Everybody can use this plugin on their websites. If you want to customize the WordPress register and login page, you can use this plugin. It is best to customize WordPress login page of a WP website. “Login Page Customize” is easy to use.

Docs and Support

You can find Docs here and more detailed information about Login Page Customize. When you cannot find the answer to your question on the FAQ or in any of the documentation, check the support forum on WordPress.org.

Login Page Customize Need Support

It is hard to continue development and support for this free plugin without contributions from users like you. If you enjoy using Login Page Customize and find it useful, please consider making a donation. Your donation will help encourage and support the plugin’s continued development and better user support.

Features

  • Background image change option
  • Logo change option
  • Login page customize option
  • Register page customize option
  • Links change option
  • Link open in new tab option
  • Text change option
  • Primary, Secondary color change option
  • Don’t Load unneccessary codes
  • Super-fast Plugin
  • Hand Coding Plugin
  • No use of any Framework/Library
  • Light Weight Plugin
  • Author Contact info, If you face any problems.

How to use

You can use this plugin with some steps, like:

  • Search and Install the Login Page Customize Plugin. You will be redirected to the plugin admin page after installing it.
  • You can change everything from here like change background image, logo change, all links change, text change, login and total register page customize.
  • Then you go to your website login page and you will see the awesome login page with all functionality.
